page.title: 15LEISURE
page.content: In my leisure time Ilike to play football, read and watch T.V.There is a football ground nearby on Sandy Lane where our local team play.Some people in our area like going to the theatre. The nearest theatre is the Gracie Fields theatre which is built onto Oulder Hill Upper School.Some people prefer to go to the cinema.The cinema in Rochdale is the ABC situated on the Esplanade.At the top of Churchill St, there is a pub called the Church Inn and it has a bowling green.There is also a bowling green near Greenbank Primary School.Many people enjoy jogging or running.Rochdale has a running club where the Rochdale Harriers are based.Parks are popular for picnics in the summer and our nearest park is Denehurst Park.The largest parks in the area are Falinge Park and Springfield Park.
